honeystore.author: CyberCNI
honeystore.description: We have detected the registration of a new member on the HoneyStore platform. His personal information is of interest to us. However, we have retrieved a database containing users' passwords in clear text, which predates his registration.< r> HoneyStore is known for using fake accounts (using honey tokens) to detect intruders and slow down attackers. We've provided some documentation on honey tokens. < r>We wish you good luck.
